string.value: Start the second knight training with #b#p1102000##k.

The second knight training requires you to hunt the #r#o100123##ks. You must hunt #r20#k of them, which is a little more than what you had to do for your first training. Let's head over to #m130010100# and hunt the #o100123#s.
You have come back after hunting all 20 #o0100123#s. Let's continue with the next training.

Shall we begin your second training then? Let's have you hunt #r#o100123##ks this time. It should be a bit more challenging. What are #o100123#s, you wonder? You probably saw them while you were hunting the #o100122#s... They somewhat resemble the #o100122#s but look like pink mochi.
How about you hunt #r20#k #o100123#s this time? You'll find them in #b#m130010100##k as well. Good luck!
You're not scared of #o100123#s, are you? They look like strawberry mochi! How interesting that you find them frightening. Well, calm yourself down and try again.

How was it? #o100123#s weren't too hard to hunt, right? Your strong foundation has allowed you to defeat them rather quickly. Keep this up and you'll become a Knight-in-Training in no time and make #p1101002# happy.
Let me know when you're ready to go on with your training.

Haven't you been able to hunt #r20 #o100123#s#k yet? If you're having trouble finding the #o100123#s, try hunting them in #m130010120#. It may save you some time to hunt there, and you can get to #m130010120# from #m130010100# very easily.
